about.shortDescription: Fresh Graduate Software Engineer passionate about building impactful applications.
about.longDescription: I am a Fresh Graduate in Software Engineering from Politeknik Negeri Indramayu with experience in developing modern web, mobile, and AI-powered applications through internships and collaborative projects. I am highly motivated to learn, possess strong analytical skills, and always eager to contribute to building scalable and user-friendly technology solutions.

projects.title: Paddy Disease Detection System
projects.description: An AI-based image classification system to detect paddy leaf diseases using Swin Transformer and Vision Transformer, integrated with a chatbot for treatment recommendations.

projects.title: Recipe Management App
projects.description: A mobile application with CRUD functionality for recipe categories using MySQL, Provider for state management, and Firebase as backend.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio landing page built with modern animations, responsive design, and dark theme aesthetics.

responsibilities: Developed REST APIs with Node.js and Express.
Integrated PostgreSQL database and optimized queries.
Collaborated with frontend team for API integration.
Built deep learning models for plant disease detection.
Implemented transfer learning using Transformer architectures.
Published research results in academic journal.
